channel.title: Terra Deum - Where imagination becomes reality
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://terradeum.com/media/banner.png[/img] [url=http://terradeum.com/home/]Terra Deum | Homepage[/url] [url=http://terradeum.com/home/webclient/]Terra Deum | Webclient[/url]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR=Green][U]Why you should consider playing TerraDeum[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Georgia]At TerraDeum,You as a player will feel like a very important part of the community. You will feel a great sense of connectivity and make new friends with Great new people. The gaming experience and features are so packed and balanced that you will see that there is no one way than the TerraDeum way. [/FONT][/SIZE]
[U][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR=Green]Server Owners[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/U] [SIZE=3][FONT=Georgia][COLOR=Red]Sigex Thee Omar[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[U][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR=Green]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/U]
[ul][*]Core Re-done [*]Real Full-screen & Resizable [*]You can choose between 667 & 720 items using :: old & ::new [*]Wilderness rewards [*]Ganodermic Armour [*]large updates each week [*]Bank tabs with search [*]Massive shops [*]Real construction [*]Voting, slayer, PVP and PVM points [*]Price checker [*]30 Team and solo boss's [*]Skills Re-written [*]Polypore staff! [*]667 Data! [*]And many more![/ul]
[CENTER][SPOILER=Pictures] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vlEt/45cc43e3bd.jpg[/img] [CENTER][COLOR=Green]Fixed Mode[/COLOR][/CENTER]
[img]http://puu.sh/9vmKJ/dcf6104f82.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][COLOR=Green]Resizable Mode[/COLOR][/CENTER]
[img]http://puu.sh/9vmey/432c26049a.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9vmhB/a282829a21.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][COLOR=Green]FullScreen Mode[/COLOR][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/9vmLZ/787553be2e.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][COLOR=Green]New item looks and Old item looks[/COLOR][/CENTER] New: [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vmUv/674558a704.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vn6s/3819ab11cb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vn3w/f3f60b2573.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vneY/4ceb5faede.jpg[/img] Old: [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vnhU/c80219311f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vnja/98dcfc5cce.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][COLOR=Green]Shops[/COLOR][/CENTER] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vnmc/df360707b5.jpg[/img] [CENTER][COLOR=Green]Some bosses[/COLOR][/CENTER] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vnRf/f5129a3e93.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9vokU/67384a9fb2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9voq9/ff402624df.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9votL/22dff3c6c4.jpg[/img] [CENTER][COLOR=Green][SIZE=4]And there are many more![/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER] [/SPOILER]
